headline: Mizuho Raises Micron (MU ) PT to $155 Due to Improved Pricing, Strong Execution
summary: Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the best performing S&P 500 stocks to buy now. On August 11, Mizuho raised the firm’s price target on Micron to $155 from $150, while keeping an Outperform rating on the shares due to the company’s improved pricing, particularly in DRAM, and strong execution. The firm sees continued […]

headline: Micron Unleashes Gen 5 and Gen 6 SSDs in Bid to Dominate AI Data Center Storage
